title: Two-wheelers drive back to the future, the electric way
description: Encouraged by the electric-powered rebirth of the Bajaj Chetak - which has been a runaway success - and a thriving domestic electric two-wheeler market, two more iconic 70s brands are electrifying their yesteryear favourites.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
